query.text: Load the cognitive map and other files
How is the environment looking after the avalanche?

query.q: owl_individual_of(A, knowrob:'Restaurant'), owl_direct_subclass_of(A, Obj), rdf_split_url('http://knowrob.org/kb/knowrob.owl#', TYPE, Obj).
query.text: Show me all the different kinds of restaurants!

query.q: owl_parse('package://knowrob_cognitive_map/owl/layer.owl'), findall(Obj, (owl_individual_of(Obj, knowrob:'System')), Objs), !, member(A, Objs), add_object_with_children(A).
query.text: Which different geological layers are present and what are the geological boundaries?

query.q: mng_db('gps_traces'), task(T), task_goal(T, '(GO-TO ?LOC ?SUN-SET)'), task_start(T, S), task_end(T, E), owl_individual_of(ACTION, knowrob:'Action'), add_pointer(...TODO...).
query.text: Where do many persons go after the sunset?
Show all the several restaurant on this map!
Show all hazardous areas on this map!
Show all hazardous areas on this map after the avalanche!

query.q: owl_individual_of(A, knowrob:'Avalanche'), owl_individual_of(B, knowrob:'Building'), display_intersection(A, B).
query.text: Show all the buildings which are affected by the avalanche!

query.q: owl_individual_of(A, knowrob:'Avalanche'), owl_individual_of(P, knowrob:'Pathway'), display_intersection(A, P).
